lyrics.text: Lesson 35. Our village. Listen to the tape, then answer this question. Are the children
lyrics.translation: 第35课。我们的村庄。听录音，然后回答这个问题。孩子们是

lyrics.text: coming out of the park or going into it? This is a photograph of our village. Our village
lyrics.translation: 从公园出来还是进去？这是我们村庄的一张照片。我们的村庄

lyrics.text: is in a valley. It is between two hills. The village is on a river. Here is another photograph
lyrics.translation: 在山谷中。它位于两座山之间。这个村庄在一条河边。这是另一张照片。

lyrics.text: of the village. My wife and I are walking along the banks of the river. We are on the
lyrics.translation: 村庄。我和我的妻子正在沿着河岸散步。我们正在

lyrics.text: left. There is a boy in the water. He is swimming across the river. Here is another photograph.
lyrics.translation: 左边。水里有一个男孩。他正在游过河。这是另一张照片。

lyrics.text: This is the school building. It is beside a park. The park is on the right. Some children are
lyrics.translation: 这是学校大楼。它位于一个公园旁边。公园在右边。一些孩子在

lyrics.text: coming out of the building. Some of them are going into the park.
lyrics.translation: 从建筑物里出来。他们中的一些人正走进公园。
